A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney needs to stop shoving its obnoxious social agenda down our throats ruining a classic franchise. Know your audience\, Disney. 

Not only that\, but this script sucked big time. The professional critics must all be on crack to like this movie. Did Disney lean on you people or something?

The biggest problem\, aside from all of the useless annoying subplots\, was the disrespect to Luke's character. Destroying a hero by making him weak and killing him off was the same waste to Han Solo who died like a chump (without Luke & Leia to witness his death\, for emotional impact\, I might add). 

 And changing hyperspace to make it trackable\, just to create a new problem\, was stupid.
And oh my God\, what happened to Yoda's face? Speeder accident?
